title: Tug of War Teams' Acceleration and Tension
body: Two teams of nine members each engage in a tug of war. Each of the first team’s members has an average mass of $$68$$ kg and exerts an average force of $$1350$$ N horizontally. Each of the second team’s members has an average mass of $$73$$ kg and exerts an average force of $$1365$$ N horizontally. What is magnitude of the acceleration of the two teams?
